doc:
Judith Hoag https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Judith_Hoag 0 Judith Hoag (; born June 29, 1968) is an American actress. She is best known for portraying April O'Neil in the first Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles film in 1990, and as Gwen Cromwell Piper in the Disney Channel Halloweentown television films series. She is also known for her role as Tandy Hampton in the ABC drama series Nashville. Judith_Hoag ( ; born June_29_,_1968 ) is an_American_actress . She is_best_known for portraying April_O'Neil in the_first_Teenage_Mutant_Ninja Turtles film in 1990 , and as Gwen_Cromwell_Piper in the_Disney_Channel_Halloweentown_television_films_series . She is_also_known for her_role as Tandy_Hampton in the_ABC_drama_series_Nashville .
